name: fleet
description: A Sails application that simulates an automotive data center

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.deploy: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-dev.yaml fleetDev
scripts.deploy-test: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-test.yaml fleetTest
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-prod.yaml fleet

author: anonymous node/sails user
